main event: A radar operator in Ottawa, Ohio, observed an unidentified bright object on the radar that remained stationary for 5 minutes before disappearing abruptly.
interesting points: The object appeared larger than a normal aircraft target on radar., No visual confirmation was made of the object., The radar contact was described as having a magnitude of 0.2., The conclusion of the observation was that the object was probably unidentified., There was a suggestion that the object could be an unidentified phenomenon.
sighted object: one very bright object on radar
